headline: Mahomes’s Leadership Gives Chiefs 2nd Life in Playoffs
abstract: After falling behind, 24-0, in the second quarter, the Chiefs rallied behind their quarterback.
lead_paragraph: KANSAS CITY, Mo. — Late in the Chiefs’ demolition of the Houston Texans on Sunday, the team posted a note on the video screen at Arrowhead Stadium telling fans that thanks to Kansas City’s 51-point outburst, all the fireworks used to celebrate scores were gone.
